name: Shiba
description: The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.

name: Akita
description: The Akita is a large breed of dog originating from the mountainous northern regions of Japan.

name: Shrew
description: A shrew or shrew mouse is a small mole-like mammal classified in the order Eulipotyphla.

name: Chameleon
description: Chameleons are a distinctive and highly specialized clade of Old World lizards.

name: Turtle
description: Turtles are reptiles of the order Testudines characterised by a special bony or cartilaginous shell developed from their ribs and acting as a shield.

name: Cane Toad
description: The cane toad is very large.
